abstract_summ: From critical COVID‐19 to the convalescent stage, early lymphopenia was improved (median: 0.6 × 10(9) L(−1) vs. 0.9 × 10L(+1), P = 0.009), and an obvious fluctuation in WBC and neutrophil counts was observed . CD4(+) and CD8(+) T cells, cytokines and HLA‐G(+) immune cells are associated with the natural history of the critical patient; however, future studies are necessary .
